description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
## SWITCH, PRESSURE/SWITCH, LIQUID LEVEL TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT

**Reference:** PW-23-01023004  
**Amendment:** 1

The Department of National Defence (DND) has published a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of specialized components, categorised under Switches (GSIN: N5930), as per public tender announcement number PW-23-01023004.

### Tender Details:

* **Items:**  Four (4) specific item codes, with respective National Stock Numbers (NSNs):
	+ Item 1 - SWITCH, PRESSURE, with 14 units required to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia. 
	+ Item 2 - SWITCH, PRESSURE, with 10 units required to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
	+ Item 3 - SWITCH, LIQUID LEVEL, with 13 units required to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
	+ Item 4 - SWITCH, LIQUID LEVEL, with 20 units required to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
* **Delivery locations and quantities prescribed**
* **Bidder requirements:**
	+ Bidders must submit competitive prices in Canadian dollars; foreign currency bids will be dismissed from consideration.
	+ Preference will be awarded to bidders proposing goods and services from Canada.

### Contact Information:

For further clarification or submission of proposals, please contact:

* Michael Dettorre  
	+ Email: [MICHAEL.DETTORRE@FORCES.GC.CA](mailto:MICHAEL.DETTORRE@FORCES.GC.CA)
	+ Address: 455 Boul de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC J8Y 6V7, CA

### Documents:

Tender documents are available in English and French versions at the Canada Buys website, linked below:

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/25/7c6cfe14448ee714618f82abd777eab0/w8482-231177_rfp_en.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/25/7f6c6a8a9cb1e9e564b8eaa2d323f318/w8482-231177_rfp_fr.pdf>
*
